member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IEvaluation
member.summary: Describes the evaluation of a TemplateAnalyzer rule against an ARM template

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IEvaluation.RuleId
member.summary: Gets the id of the rule this evaluation is for.

member.summary: Gets the description of the rule this evaluation is for.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IEvaluation.Recommendation
member.summary: Gets the recommendation for addressing this evaluation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IEvaluation.HelpUri
member.summary: Gets the Uri where help for this evaluation can be found.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IEvaluation.Severity
member.summary: Gets the Severity of the rule this evaluation is for.

member.summary: Gets the identifier of the file this evaluation is for.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not the rule for this evaluation passed.

member.summary: Gets the collections of evaluations from this evaluation.

member.summary: Gets the collections of results from this evaluation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IEvaluation.HasResults
member.summary: Gets whether this evaluation has corresponding results.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IJsonPathResolver
member.summary: An interface for working with a JSON scope.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IJsonPathResolver.JToken
member.summary: Gets the JToken of the resolver's scope.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IJsonPathResolver.Path
member.summary: Gets the JSON path of the resolver's current scope.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IJsonPathResolver.Resolve(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the JToken(s) of the current scope at the specified path.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.IJsonPathResolver.ResolveResourceType(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the JTokens for resources of the specified type in a "resources" property array at the current scope.
member.param: The type of resource to find.
member.returns: An enumerable of resolvers with a scope of a resource of the specified type.

member.summary: Contains all forms of an ARM template and information about the template

member.summary: The original template parsed into JSON

member.summary: The template with resolved parameter/variable references and expressions

member.summary: Whether this template was originally a Bicep file

member.summary: Source map that maps ARM JSON back to source Bicep

member.summary: A unique identifier for the template

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.TemplateContext.IsMainTemplate
member.summary: Whether this template is the top-level template in a deployment or nested within another template

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Templates.Analyzer.Types.TemplateContext.ResourceMappings
member.summary: Mapping between resources in the expanded template to their original resource in the original template. Used to get line numbers. The key is the path in the expanded template with value being the path in the original template.
